channel.title: Arrows aren't stackable on ground when ranging?
channel.description:
They don't stack up.. It just says
Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow Rune arrow
How would I fix this? It would be in client.java right?
And im not using Delta.
